summary: Implements an edge‑conditioned graph convolution that computes messages by multiplying neighbor node features with weight matrices generated from edge features, then aggregates these messages (sum/mean/max) to update node representations, optionally adding residual and bias terms.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, learnable graph neural network layer for tasks such as quantum chemistry and other graph‑structured data, enabling dynamic, edge‑dependent transformations within DGL models.
